name: Due By Monday
description:
*The game is packaged as a self-extracting executable*

Due By Monday is a exploration game that turned into a speed-running simulator while in development. Get the best times, find the four hidden notes and don't get caught by the.... boss? 

We greatly appreciate any and all feedback on the game. Thank you for playing and we hope to see you soon.

-Slothclap

P.S. Coming in on the weekend is not an option.
